body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Secure Auto. My name is Juan Smith and I'm here to assist you today. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marilyn. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have concerns about the security at your Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Marilyn. Can I please have your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two three four - one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn. And to better assist you, can you please provide me with your email address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is mrobinson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Marilyn. Our team will review your concerns and reach out to you shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you for your help. I'm feeling relieved now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marilyn. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
